description:
Blue Demon Lord`s son whose body was possessed by the spirits of the Ancient Demon Lords after Hero forced them out of the Demon King`s body, and intended to make use of them to usurp her position and become the new Demon Lord. After a failed attempt to assassinate Demon King, he loses the trust of other clans and flees with his companions. Possessing the powers of the Ancient Demon Lords, Blue Demon Son`s strength is on par with Hero`s, injuring him badly after a fight between them.
Source: en.wiki
name: Kokuin-ou
